name: Yektanesik High-Altitude Coffee
story: Grown in the shade of native trees in the mountains, each Yektanesik ('Noble Heart' in Nahuatl) bean is hand-harvested by families who have perfected the art of coffee for generations. It's not just a drink, it's the flavor of our land and the warmth of our people.
description: Organic shade-grown high-altitude coffee with chocolate notes and intense aroma. Artisanal process from harvest to roasting.
producer: San Juan Tahitic Coffee Growers Cooperative
process: Manual harvest, natural fermentation, sun drying

name: Chiwanjmej Liqueurs
story: Chiwanjmej ('Made with the Heart') is our collection of liqueurs that capture the spirit of festivals and celebrations. Slowly macerated with local fruits and regional sugarcane, each bottle is a toast to tradition and good company.
description: Artisanal liqueurs macerated with seasonal fruits and local sugarcane distillate. Unique flavors that reflect our biodiversity.
process: Manual harvesting, maceration in oak barrels

name: Sowing Life Soaps
story: Made under the 'Sowing Life' seal, these soaps are a tribute to local flora. We use medicinal plants and essential oils from our mountains, creating a product that cleanses the body and respects the earth.
description: Artisanal soaps with medicinal plants and regional essential oils. Natural care for skin and the environment.
process: Cold process, natural curing for 4 weeks

name: Cow Grass
story: Forage sustainably cultivated on our community lands. Nutritious and natural food for livestock, produced with techniques that respect the ecosystem balance.
description: High-quality grass for animal feed, cultivated without pesticides or herbicides. Natural nutrition for healthy livestock.
process: Rotational cultivation, manual harvest, natural drying

name: Xochitl Honey
story: Xochitl ('Flower' in Nahuatl) is our pure honey, harvested by bees that pollinate the wildflowers of our mountains. A sweet natural treasure that sweetens while preserving biodiversity.
description: 100% pure honey from native bees, sustainably harvested. Intense flavor and preserved natural properties.
